title: Napoleonic Wars
description: Large medallion of Napoleon on horseback alternates vertically with large medallion of brown eagle grasping branch, the leaves of which are labelled with the names of Napoleon's great battles. The match is to be dropped at the sides, and where the join occurs half a laurel wreath or half a trophy of helmets is shown, printed on white ground sown with small blue polka dots.
name: Sidewall
